rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, you've gathered a pretty good
bunch of firewood there.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0002
rows.name:
We should be able to cook some
pretty tasty rice with this.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0003
rows.name: Cook...rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0004
rows.name: Well, yeah.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0005
rows.name:
That's why I asked you to gather
firewood and find me a place for
a campfire.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0006
rows.name: What are we cooking rice for?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0007
rows.name: What're we cooking rice for?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0008
rows.name: For what reason are we cooking rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0009
rows.name: And what's all this rice cooking for?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0010
rows.name: What do you think it's for, genius?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0011
rows.name: To eat, of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0012
rows.name: Hey Yoshitsune, you got everything ready?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, yes... I have the equipment,
the spices and the script right here.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0014
rows.name:
Huh? Wait, is Yoshitsune doing the cooking?
What about you, Benkei?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0015
rows.name:
Heheh...
I'm here for the eating!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0016
rows.name:
Right. Of course you are.
Why did I even ask.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0017
rows.name:
There's no point expecting my
sister to be able to cook.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0018
rows.name:
Outside of weapon collecting and
tidying up, she has no skills whatsoever.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0019
rows.name:
Shaddup, you. Less mouthing off
and more rice cooking!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes, yes... Why must I be cursed
with such a domineering sister?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0021
rows.name:
Though some would say
that's her best quality.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0022
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0023
rows.name: So what, are we eating...just rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0024
rows.name: Did you say she's good at...tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0025
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0026
rows.name: Uh, are we eating just rice? That's it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0027
rows.name: Hang on, she's good at tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0028
rows.name: What shall I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0029
rows.name: Is this meal to consist of rice alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0030
rows.name: Did you say she is good at tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0031
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0032
rows.name: So we're having just rice? That's it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0033
rows.name: Uh, what was that about tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0101
rows.name:
Good point. Rice on its own is
hardly a proper meal.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0102
rows.name:
Oh, Hikari.
You're such a child sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0103
rows.name:
Yoshitsune, have you got the
you-know-what?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0104
rows.name: But of course. Right here.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0105
rows.name:
Ooh yes, this is what I'm talking about!
Pickled to perfection!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0106
rows.name: What are these things?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0107
rows.name: Pickled plums!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0108
rows.name: Pickled...plums?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0109
rows.name: So they're edible...are they?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0110
rows.name: Pickled what?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0111
rows.name: Never heard of those before...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0112
rows.name: Pickled plums...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0113
rows.name:
What are those, exactly?
Some kind of confection?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0114
rows.name: Pickled wha...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0115
rows.name:
Never heard of them.
Are they for eating?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0116
rows.name:
They are a kind of fruit, soaked
over time in a saline solution.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0117
rows.name:
What we do is, we wrap them up in
the sticky rice and make rice balls.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0118
rows.name:
When the rice is freshly cooked,
they taste amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0119
rows.name:
Rice balls I've heard of, but are these
shriveled things really edible?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0120
rows.name:
Trust me, they're good.
Wanna try one?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0121
rows.name: Ewww, it's all soft and squishy...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0122
rows.name: Guehhhh! That's sour!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0123
rows.name:
Water!
Get me some water! Quick!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0124
rows.name: What ARE these things?!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0125
rows.name:
Are you sure they're meant to be
edible?! Are you trying to poison me?!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0126
rows.name:
Ahahahahah!
Nah, they're not poisonous.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0127
rows.name:
As it happens, they are rather healthy.
They have antibacterial properties.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0128
rows.name:
Huh? Am I really the only one who
appreciates the finer tastes in life?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0130
rows.name:
Freshly cooked rice balls with
pickled plums, under the open sky...
What could be better?!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0131
rows.name:
How 'bout you, Driver?
You'll have one, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0201
rows.name:
What's that face for? Does it surprise
you that tidying up is a skill of mine?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0202
rows.name: Well, um, frankly, yeah.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0203
rows.name:
And what's that supposed to mean?!
So what if I'm a tidy person?!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0204
rows.name: Calm down, my dear Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0205
rows.name:
This may surprise you all, but my sister
is actually quite the orderly type.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0206
rows.name:
She claims it irritates her to no end
when things are left out of place.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0207
rows.name:
She even lines up all the weapons
she collects in order of size.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0208
rows.name: She's a real stickler for these things.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0209
rows.name: Listen, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0210
rows.name:
Isn't it weird to be obsessive like
that when you're so...um...crude?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0211
rows.name: Excuse me?!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0212
rows.name:
If it's a fight you're after,
I'll give you one!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0213
rows.name:
Oh, wait. I get it.
I know what this is about.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0214
rows.name:
You're the catastrophically
untidy type, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0215
rows.name:
I... I h-have no idea what
you're t-talking about!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0216
rows.name:
Ohhhh yeah, I know your type.
You act all cute, but at home you
turn every room into a den of trash.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0217
rows.name: Yeah, people like that are the worst.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0218
rows.name:
My Driver will agree with me
on that one - right?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0219
rows.name: What? Um, I... I guess...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0220
rows.name:
I do prefer people to tidy up
after themselves...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0221
rows.name: Well, no one likes a messy type.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0222
rows.name:
Not that I can exactly talk
on that front.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0223
rows.name: I must say I agree.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0224
rows.name:
A lack of organization in one's
day-to-day life is a sign of a
troubled mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0225
rows.name: Well, yeah... I guess...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0226
rows.name:
I'd probably be keener on a girl
who could clean up after herself.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0227
rows.name:
Sh-shut up!
Don't answer the question seriously!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0228
rows.name:
So, Hikari. Ready to admit
who's in the wrong here?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0229
rows.name:
If you apologize now, I might be willing
to give you a few tidiness pointers!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0230
rows.name: Not in a million years!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0231
rows.name:
Ahahahah!
Well, don't come crying to me
when Rex gives up on you!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0232
rows.name: Grrr...
